review: Great product if you want to stop using gaming systems as a streaming system. The software responds fast, however it does have an issue every now and then where it can jump around the menu without you pushing a button, however that is rare. I like that you can tap into other networks apps to stream their content. Otherwise a solid product. I took a star away because i feel the firmware needs some bug fixes.

review: We went from a WDTVLive to this, and it was a night and day difference.  The menu is fast and responsive, the videos load up much faster than with the TVLive.  We had tried the chromecast as well, but since it's not a stand-alone device, we were just frustrated, not only with the interface, but with the performance.  One thing I miss from the TVLive is the ability to browse a network share, but since I put a plex server on my network server, this has become a non-issue.
